title: Charles908
author: Charles908
content: Smart contract is new emerging technology in the web 3.0 .It has self executing program that allows block chain transaction without involving third party.But there are some vulnerability problems that needs to be dealt through audit. Audit plays most important role in uplifting the project. Non audited ProjectsÂ  are vulnerable to security threats. There is another project introduced in the market a couple of days ago that is arbitrum based and audited by one of the eminent firms solid .It shows that people people who will be investing in oscar,there investments will be saved and due to arbitrum blockchain they can transact their valuable assets at high speed and with less money
